title: Mars in Capricorn
summary: Drive turns disciplined, strategic, and results-focused. Effort goes toward structure, responsibility, and goals that endure. The opportunity is to work steadily without becoming rigid or overburdened.

meaning.headline: Action prioritizes competence, planning, and sustainable output.

frames.text: Mars in Capricorn supports perseverance, ambition, and taking responsibility for outcomes.
Energy is best spent on tasks with clear purpose and payoff.
Physical discipline-like training or structured movement-feels productive.
Work is the only measure of worth.

do: Clarify the goal and the resources available.
Share responsibilities instead of carrying everything.
avoid: Cutting corners to stay on schedule
Resisting help that could lighten the load

reusable_lines.text: Discipline can carry you far today-pair it with rest.
Aim for durable progress, not just speed.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can strengthen perseverance and structure
Agency-forward language: you choose pacing and responsibility
Contextual framing: discipline helps when balanced with care

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
